description: This course is a study of the smaller forms of choral literature from the Renaissance to the present with an emphasis on music suitable for junior and senior high school and church choirs. Students study scores and discuss interpretation and conducting problems. Prerequisite: Music 214, 241, and 242 and junior standing. Offered Spring Semester.
name: Choral Lit I
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Music 214, 241, and 242 and junior standing. Offered Spring Semester.
title: Choral Literature I
